body.description: A charming, inexpensive, and practical floor lamp to meet your basic lighting needs. This simple mother/daughter floor lamp with reading light features a painted finish and plastic white shades. Perfect for living room, bedroom, office, kids room, or college dorm.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Features & Specs 3-Way Switch 3-Way Switch allows you to set the mood with low, medium or high settings. Whether you want a cozy low light or a bright work light, this lamp won't disappoint. *Main light uses 1 X 100W 3-way type A medium base bulb (not included) ***Please note that if a 3-Way bulb is not used, the settings will not work properly***. Light where you need it most Fully adjustable reading/task light that can be used independent of the main floor lamp. Adjustable Reading or Task Light This separate reading light features a metal goose neck arm so that the light can be positioned where it is most needed. Use it near an armchair, bedside, desk or craft table for just the right amount of light. This reading light can be used together with the floor light or on its own. *Reading light uses 1 X 60W type A medium base bulb (not included).
Neutral Colors Make furnishing your home a cinch by choosing simple lighting and neutral tones that can match virtually any room in your house.
Dress it up or Dress it Down Simple yet beautiful. These lamps can be utilized practically anywhere in your indoor space that you desire.

Fit Guide This lamp stands 71" tall. It measures approx 20.47" wide including the reading light. The large shade has a diameter of 11.35" and a height of 4.5". The reading light shade has a diameter of 6" and a height of 4". From base to reading light measures approx 50.5". From base to main light measures approx 67".

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great lamp but must be assembled correctly to be sturdy
reviews.reviewText: This a fantastic looking, well-made lamp — if you put it together properly. It’s not difficult and there is nothing wrong with the lamp or the instructions — you just have to fully screw it together and the people reporting problems in their reviews probably are experiencing the same issue my teenager did: I ordered this for my college freshman daughter. She reported (like many of the reviewers here) that the stem was weak and couldn’t be threaded together properly so the lamp wouldn’t stand up and was wobbly when she screwed it together. I thoughtMaybe she’d stripped the threads so I mailed her some plumbers tape to try on the threads but it made no difference. When we went to pick her up at college she had shoved the lamp into a closet saying it was “messed up” and not usable. Her dad and I took a look (thinking it was on its way to the trash) and immediately saw she hadn’t assembled it properly. The threads in the stem must be screwed in fully to each piece (as far as they can be screwed in, until they can’t go any further) and then the whole thing goes together beautifully — it took us less than two minutes to fix the problem. It was simply a rookie mistake that my daughter didn’t realize that the threads needed to be fully in each piece before the next piece was connected. Lamp is now put together and a great addition to her room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An honest review
reviews.reviewText: Not gonna lie, I was a little hesitant about ordering this lamp just based off the reviews but figured for the price what the heck give a try. If there's any issues just return it not a big deal.(Pros) It seems good for now. Assembly was very easy had it done in about 2-3 minutes. However, I could see why people were struggling when it comes to assembling the poles and the wire. You have to pull the wire at the bottom of the base each time a new pole is put in this way there's no slack. They don't tell you that in the instructions (READ THOSE VERY CAREFULLY) which is fine very straight forward. Plastic shades work great especially if you have little kids or grandkids. Gives off a tremendous amount of light in my bedroom. Especially love the reading lamp works great for the computer etc.(Cons) The base is top heavy because of that the lamp will slightly lean to one side not a big deal right now remember this lamp is designed to be set in the corner of a room not moved 10,000 times lol. The side lamp is little flimsy, I understand assembly isn't everyone's strong suit. Basically you get what you pay for which is fineOverall I'm happy with it. For the price of a simple lamp you just can't beat it. Remember don't expect quality again you get what you pay for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars If its positioned "out of the way" then its a perfectly adequate lamp
reviews.reviewText: Assembly: very easy, didn't read any instructions as i thought it was more than straight foward what needed to be done.. As other reviewers have said, you need to pull the POWER cable (at the BASE) as you screw in each rod so there isn't excess cable preventing the final rod from being screwed on. The final rod was a bit tougher to screw in than the rest of the rods as i still had a bit too much cable and it was getting in the way. I could see someone shorter than me finding this tough since you need access to both the base and the top at the same time at one point.My Findings:(THE GOOD) The lamp for my uses is great. For two reasons.. FIRST: I put it in between my desk and wall (near corner of room as recommended) which works out very well for one reason.. The base (of my lamp at least this might be a flaw with just my lamp) is not very stable. The poles are sturdy together but they tend to wobble (as one piece) on the base). For this reason i HEAVILY recommend only getting this if you can leave it somewhere where it won't be bumped into by kids or anyone normally.The second main reason this lamp is perfect for me is because i am using the LIFX BR30 Multicolor Light Bulbs (2 of them - one in each fixture on this lamp). The bulbs themselves are accessible VIA wifi through an APP or even my Echo Spot so i never need to even touch this lamp. Again, making the "wobble factor" not matter since it will hardly ever be touched or bumped into. Having the adjustable secondary light is awesome. Both fixtures fit the extra large br30 LIFX bulbs perfectly..Worth mentioning - even just one of the LIFX bulbs is more expensive than this entire lamp haha(THE BAD) The only negative i find with this lamp so far (i only just bought it) is the base not being particularly sturdy. I believe i screwed in the first pole as securely as it can be and yet it still leans with the weight. Now, i still marked this 4 stars because one could argue that the added weight of my LIFX BR30 bulbs could be making it wobble a bit more. But to be honest, it was wobbling before i even screwed the bulbs in..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bright, Pretty Sturdy, Easy to Assemble, Long-Lasting, and Lovely - Great Quality at Great Price
reviews.reviewText: Very pleased with this lamp for the price. For a lamp, it is pretty bright, especially when both bulbs are on. Not so much to brightly light a large room, but enough to add plenty of light for reading/working on activities and to illuminate a dark area. The lamp was easy to assemble, and seems pretty sturdy. It has had no issues with staying on or dimming or anything of the sort, and I have had it for around eight months (since late March 2021). It has stayed on almost constantly, and has not had any issues. The only few issues I have had with this lamp are minor. For one, after moving it around a bit and rotating it, the poles began to loosen somewhat, though this was because I unintentionally loosened them. I was able to tighten them back up easily, however. I also find that it will wobble a bit if you push on it or if you lightly kick the base. It does not wobble when walking by it or even when I stomped near it. It does not seem that it is in danger of falling over or anything like that, even if you kick or push it lightly. It probably would if you run into it hard enough though. Overall I am very pleased with this lamp, especially at the price it is, and highly recommend it. It is quite bright for a lamp; it has two light fixtures, one of which is adjustable/movable; it is easy to assemble; it looks exactly like the image shown and is stylish; and it is pretty sturdy.
Packaging wasn’t very well put together ..flimsy box. However the lamp was not affected by the poor packaging.
It gives a lot of light and fits where I wanted!
Me gusto mucho y lo mejor es que el cable está por dentro del soporte
I love this lamp so much I have just ordered a second one for use in another room. The upper lamp offers great lumination and the secondary lamp is at a perfect level for reading etc. Great purchase

reviews.reviewTitle: There's a sturdy base and it gives off very good light.
reviews.reviewText: It arrived well packaged and it was easy to assemble. The one thing to watch for was tiny bits of styrofoam that stuck to the lamp parts. Be sure all the tiny bits are removed from the light sockets and the edge of the shades.Other than that, the colour and size of the lamp was as advertised. The secondary light is easy to move so it can be directed as needed for reading.
